item.title: Lesley add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "I have three phobias which, could I mute them,would make my life as slick as a sonnet,but dull as ditch water:I hate to go to bed,I hate to get up and I hate to be alone..." -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Rolling Stones
item.description: "The sunlight bores the daylights out of me" -- Rolling Stones

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "Oh well, perhaps when you're my age you'll know the heart is an untrustworthy beast.The mind too,but it doesn't talk about love." -- Graham Greene

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "If this glorious birth to death hassle is the only hassle we are ever to have ..if our grand exhilarating fight of life is such a tragically short little scrap anyway,compared to the eons of rounds before and after-then why should one want to relinquish even a few precious seconds of it?" -- Ken Kesey
